|CD            = 15s
|duration      = 10s
|energyCost    = 60
|scale_att1    = ATK
|utility1      = Interruption Resistance
|utility2      = Cooldown Reduction
|utility3      = Cooldown Reset
|utility4      = Requires Staying on Field
